channel.title: Home on GeoSTL
channel.description: Recent content in Home on GeoSTL

item.title: Events
item.description: Scheduel of events YPG/GeoSTL: Geospatial Tech Talk - October, 15th Description: Looking to learn more about the geospatial world and how you can get involved in the St. Louis area? Join USGIF’s Young Professionals Group and GeoSTL for an evening of learning and networking. Hear from USGIF Board Member Patty Mims and T-REX’s Patty Hagen about both organizations and how they are contributing to the overall geospatial mission in the St.

item.title: About
item.description: We bring together Developers, Geographers, Students, hobbyists, Data scientists, and anyone else regardless of skill level to learn and create maps. We work on group projects in collaboration with regional organizations, field collection, host mapathons, and have networking events. If you would like to host a meeting, present, or bake some cookies, we welcome the opportunity! All skill levels are free to join.
